00025 #ifndef SYX_SCHEDULER_H
00026 #define SYX_SCHEDULER_H
00027 
00028 #include "syx-platform.h"
00029 #include "syx-types.h"
00030 #include "syx-object.h"
00031 
00032 #include <stdio.h>
00033 
00034 SYX_BEGIN_DECLS
00035 
00036 EXPORT extern SyxOop syx_processor;
00037 EXPORT extern SyxOop *_syx_processor_first_process;
00038 EXPORT extern SyxOop *_syx_processor_active_process;
00039 EXPORT extern SyxOop *_syx_processor_byteslice;
00040 
00041 typedef struct SyxSchedulerPoll SyxSchedulerPoll;
00042 
00044 struct SyxSchedulerPoll
00045 {
00047   syx_nint fd;
00049   SyxOop semaphore;
00050   SyxSchedulerPoll *next;
00051 };
00052 
00053 typedef syx_bool (* SyxSchedulerSourceFunc) (void);
00054 
00055 EXPORT extern void syx_scheduler_init (void);
00056 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_scheduler_iterate (void);
00057 EXPORT extern void syx_scheduler_run (void);
00058 EXPORT extern void syx_scheduler_quit (void);
00059 
00060 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_scheduler_add_process (SyxOop process);
00061 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_scheduler_remove_process (SyxOop process);
00062 
00063 EXPORT extern void syx_scheduler_poll_read_register (syx_nint fd, SyxOop semaphore);
00064 EXPORT extern void syx_scheduler_poll_write_register (syx_nint fd, SyxOop semaphore);
00065 EXPORT extern void syx_scheduler_poll_register_source (SyxSchedulerSourceFunc callback, SyxOop semaphore);
00066 EXPORT extern void syx_scheduler_poll_unregister_source (SyxSchedulerSourceFunc callback, SyxOop semaphore);
00067 
00069 #define syx_processor_byteslice (*_syx_processor_byteslice)
00070 
00072 #define syx_processor_active_process (*_syx_processor_active_process)
00073 
00074 
00076 EXPORT extern void _syx_scheduler_save (FILE *image);
00077 EXPORT extern void _syx_scheduler_load (FILE *image);
00078 
00079 SYX_END_DECLS
00080 
00081 #endif /* SYX_SCHEDULER_H */
